item.description:
A few months ago, after a Meet Up at Starbucks, some of us went
To get something to eat at the Equinox Diner in Orange, Ct.
They did have very good food there.

Since then, Julie of Equinox Diner has invited our Meet Up
Group to go there before, during or after a Meet Up.

I think that we should start 2010 right by having one of
Our January Meet Ups at the Equinox Diner.

It is next to the CVS on Rte 1 in Orange.

If there is any bad weather, such as snow, ice or very hard rain, then
Meet Ups will be automatically cancelled.
I do not want my members being injured for just coming to a Meet Up.


A.
http://www.equinoxdin...

www.equinoxdiner.com/

Home may be where the heart is but at the Equinox Diner you’ll find yourself at home right here!
We’ve reinvented the diner for the 21st century yet preserved ALL the best about the diner experience.


B.

item.name: Coffee Talk Gets a Bite to Eat at Equinox Diner
